root.name: Realms of Arkania III: Shadows over Riva
root.description: Realms of Arkania III: Shadows over Riva , also know as "Das Schwarze Auge: Schatten Ã¼ber Riva" was released in Germany in December 1996. It was the third Realms of Arkania Game and the first one to feature a 3d Overworld.AvailabilityThis game is available at gog.com
